name: AI Marketing Tools Pro
shortDescription: 418+ AI-powered marketing tools in Webflow Designer
description: Access 418+ AI marketing tools directly in Webflow Designer. Search, filter by category, and launch tools instantly. Includes Meta/Facebook Ads management, Google Ads optimization, SEO tools, content generation, social media automation, analytics, and bulk CMS content generation.
author: MarketingTool.Pro

pricing.name: Free
pricing.description: Access all 418 tools with 10 uses per month, 10 CMS items, community support

pricing.name: Pro
pricing.description: Unlimited tool access, 1,000 CMS items per month, priority support, API access

pricing.name: Enterprise
pricing.description: Unlimited everything, dedicated support, white-label option, custom integrations

designerExtension.description: Access 418+ AI marketing tools directly in Webflow Designer. Search, filter by category, and launch tools instantly.

dataClient.description: Bulk generate AI content into Webflow CMS. Create blog posts, product descriptions, and more at scale.
